name: T-SeriesUnofficialBollywoodsongsuggester
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: song suggestion
des:
Having Difficulty finding good songs from Bollywood? Just open this skill and get suggestions for top Bollywood songs from all time.
Alexa, open song suggestion

The skill will respond to you with a robotic voice of text to speech audio reciting the name of the song and the movie. Then you can ask Alexa to play the same song, by saying Alexa, open <song name> from <movie name>

For any function related questions, please reach out to us at official mail address - developer@keyringcorp.co 👨🏻‍💻

Your reviews motivate us to build wonderful skills like this one. If you have not already, please show your support by sharing your suggestions at info@keyringcorp.co 👨🏻‍💻
We want to hear from you!

The Robotic Voice used is from online free Text To Speech Service.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
